evidence: Project structure separates models, views, and controllers (MVC pattern) in the Django framework
Views are organized by user roles (students, teachers) and contain business logic
Models define data structures and relationships using Django ORM
Templates are used for presentation layer with HTML files organized by feature
URL routing maps to view functions/classes following MVC routing patterns
Uses Django's built-in authentication and form handling systems
risks: Tight coupling between Django framework components
Business logic mixed with view layer instead of separated domain layer
Potential scalability issues with monolithic structure
